quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"refusal"(拒绝)或"foul"(污秽)产生联想，或通过"re-"+"foul"+"-ment"词根猜测为"拒绝"或"清除污秽"，忽略其"驱回难民"的法律术语义。
quiz_item.sentence: The UN condemned the country's practice of **refoulement**, which forced thousands of refugees back to the conflict zone they had escaped from.

option.definition: 驱回（难民至其母国或危险地区）
清除环境中的污秽或污染物
